parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Style of balloon as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Upper text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Text for the upper text in the balloon

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Lower text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Text for the lower text in the balloon; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: True to show quantity, false to not

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement
parameters.description: Placement of quantity value: 0 = Left 1 = Right 2 = Top 3 = Bottom

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText
parameters.description: Denotation text for quantity
